title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping the Ollama REST API with POJO models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight NPM CLI that proxies commands to the local Ollama server.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code suggestions via Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot UI that connects to Ollama for local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library exposing Ollama REST endpoints with async/await and streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic wrappers over the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-based streaming and supervision trees.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community-maintained list of official & third-party SDKs for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that queries local Ollama models on user commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin enabling AI autocomplete and summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.
